Name: Hawaiian Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
History: Adapted from a cocktail we discovered in 2004 in Las Vegas, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Hawaiian Cocktail contains 176 calories
